snippet: The University of Minnesota Gophers men's hockey team did not play over the weekend but remained in first place in the Western Collegiate Hockey Association.
abstract: The University of Minnesota Gophers men's hockey team did not play over the weekend but remained in first place in the Western Collegiate Hockey Association.
lead_paragraph: Throughout the college hockey season, Slap Shot will feature reports about some of the country's top-ranked teams.

headline.main: Minnesota Holds On to Conference Lead
